integration.description: Information about the integration with the payment system.

transaction.description: The transaction associated with the refund.

dispute.description: Details related to any dispute associated with the refund.

settlement.description: Details related to the settlement of the refund.

id.description: The unique identifier for the refund.

domain.description: The domain related to the refund.

currency.description: The currency in which the refund was made.

refunded_at.description: The date and time when the refund was processed.

refunded_by.description: The entity that processed the refund.

customer_note.description: Any notes provided by the customer regarding the refund.

merchant_note.description: Any notes provided by the merchant regarding the refund.

deducted_amount.description: The amount deducted for the refund.

fully_deducted.description: Indicates if the refund amount was fully deducted.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the refund was created.
